amendment.description: To address the applicability of certain State authorities with respect to national banks, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4034 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 154.

action.text: Amendment SA 4034 proposed by Senator Corker to Amendment SA 3739. (consideration: CR S3866-3868, S3872; text: CR S3866-3867) To address the applicability of certain State authorities with respect to national banks, and for other purposes.
